message.text: Keeps your arrows from flying off mark when you loose them whilst in motion. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases shaking width further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from Fire attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Increases Force Gauge when a blocked attack matches the element enchanted to your rod. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Force Gauge further.</COL>
Makes it harder for an enemy to throw you off whilst you're clinging to it. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases likelihood of stagger further.</COL>
Increases the Blow Power of Magic Trap, allowing it to break enemy posture more easily. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Blow Power further.</COL>
トゲや鍾乳石などの危険物との接触時に 受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
Increases the Knockout Power of perfect blocks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Knockout Power further.</COL>
Extends the time period that explosive arrows will linger before exploding. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends time further.</COL>
Decreases the rate at which you receive the debilitation "Catching Fire" when struck by Fire attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases resistance further.</COL>
Decreases the Stamina consumed when you block attacks with your shield. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>
Decreases likelihood of being staggered while rolling. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases likelihood further.</COL>
Decreases Stamina consumption while using Levitate. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>
鉱泉に浸かったときの 効能持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
Decreases the Stamina consumed when you grapple-hold opponents. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>
Increases your Blow Power when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Blow Power further.</COL>
Provides allies with increased Defense after picking them up from incapacitation. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.</COL>
Increases the rate at which Attract generates enemy attention. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases attention further.</COL>
Decreases stamina consumed by the "Shake" action. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases stamina consumption further.</COL>
Amplifies your Magick when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Magick further.</COL>
各種投擲アイテムを投げつけたときに 与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
Extends the attack range of perfect block counters. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the range further.</COL>
Decreases recoil after firing your bow. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases recoil further.</COL>
Decreases the attention of enemies while using Field Shift. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases attention further.</COL>
Increases the effect duration of Force Enchantment. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration further.</COL>
Extends the flying distance of the Seeker Rope. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the distance further.</COL>
Allows use of Back Move while charging magic. The charge will continue, but you will suffer a penalty to the chant gauge. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases penalty to the chant gauge further.</COL>
マップ上のアイテム採取ポイント 表示範囲が拡大する
Decreases the charge time of Guard Break, allowing you to swing the sword more quickly. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases charge time further.</COL>
Extends the time period for active reload. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends time further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from Ice attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Decreases damage received when staggering after your guard is broken. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Increases jump height when assisted by another person. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases jump height further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt with the Fire attribute. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
各種回復アイテムを使ったときに より高い効果が得られる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果がより上昇</COL>
Provides a surge in strength when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Strength further.</COL>
Increases Stamina recovery speed while your bow is ready to fire. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina recovery further.</COL>
Decreases the rate at which you receive the debilitation "Frozen Solid" when struck by Ice attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases resistance further.</COL>
Improves your Defense and Magick Defense when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Defense and Magick Defense further.</COL>
Decrease damage received from Giant enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt with the Ice attribute. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
一定時間、特殊効果が付与されるアイテムの 効果持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
Facilitates easier escapes from enemy grapple-holds. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases escape ease further.</COL>
Extends the time window for a master reload, making it easier to perform. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends time window further.</COL>
Provides allies with increased Magick Defense after picking them up from incapacitation. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.</COL>
Increases your Strength after leaving White Dragon Temple for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Strength further.</COL>
Decreases Stamina consumption when resisting an enemy's attempt to shake you off. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt with the Thunder attribute. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
新月時に筋力と魔力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に筋力/魔力がより増加</COL>
Relax your blocking, allowing recovery of Stamina upon performing perfect blocks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina recovery further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Ogre enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from Thunder attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Allows some Force Gauge to remain after your gauge is consumed. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the amount further.</COL>
Increases the Blow Power of your Seeker Rope, increasing the likelihood it will break enemy posture. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Blow Power further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Demon enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
新月時に物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理/魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Soft enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Winged enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
Decreases the rate at which you receive the debilitation "Shock" when struck by Thunder attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases resistance further.</COL>
Allows you to more easily perform perfect blocks, just as foes strike. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the perfect block time window further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Giant enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Cursed enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
雨天時に筋力と魔力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に筋力/魔力がより増加</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Demihuman enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from Ogre enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Skeleton enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from overblocking. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Decreases likelihood of being staggered when damaged in the air. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases likelihood further.</COL>
Decrease damage received from Demon enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
雨天時に物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理/魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
Decreases damage received from Soft enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from Winged enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Increases damage dealt to Undead enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
Improves the effectiveness of your shield, allowing you to easily prevent stronger attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Guard Power further.</COL>
Decreases Stamina consumption while in the air. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>
Decrease damage received from Cursed enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from Demihuman enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Restores Stamina when performing a master reload. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina restoration further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from Skeleton enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Increases the rate at which you gain Force Gauge. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases gain further.</COL>
Increases the damage of aerial attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>
Restores Stamina upon successful spell inputs. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina restored further.</COL>
Increases Strength when your Stamina is above a certain amount. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Strength further.</COL>
Increases the number of arrows that can be loaded into the quiver at a time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases arrow count further.</COL>
Decreases damage received from Undead enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>
Increases the rate at which Force Burst applies elemental debilitations. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases debilitation rate further.</COL>
Increases the jump height of your Double Jump. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases jump height further.</COL>
Decreases the difficulty of doing Chanting inputs, making it easier to increase the magic's power. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases difficulty further.</COL>
Increases attack speed when using Gouge. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases attack speed further.</COL>
Decreases Stamina consumption while channeling Heal Aura and Holy Aura. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>
炎防低下の状態異常にかかりにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値さらに軽減</COL>

闇防低下の状態異常にかかりにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値さらに軽減</COL>

延焼の状態異常からの回復速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常回復速度がより上昇</COL>
